eu_initiatives: We are following in particular H2020 SME initiative, and more generally all policies with a link to supporting innovation and SME development.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EP Tender is a range extending service for electric vehicles. With our modular approach, EVs can satisfy both essential constraints: be affordable and versatile, with occasional long distance trip ability and peace of mind. Pure EV with a reasonable battery on daily usage, and plug-in hybrid for longer trips, by towing an energy module on demand.  The Tenders are powered indifferently by gasoline, hydrogen, battery or inductive road as provided by the infrastructure and technology progress.
relevant_communication:
We are contributing to public consultations on the above subjects. 
We are in particular encouraging the financing of successful H2020 SME phase2 projects, in order to help them reach scale and the deployment of their products and services to the global market. 
We have participated to various H2020 events. 
We have also been consulted regarding the upcoming new oral procedure for the final selection of H2020 SME phase 2 candidates.
